arts.ttl: Ipswich Town: Sam Morsy discusses his first Premier League goal
arts.oTtl: East Anglican Daily Times - Ispwich Town FC
arts.sum: “The last minute of the game makes it sweeter and it’s a good point on the road. It was his first Premier League goal and one that earned Ipswich Town a vital point away at Southampton.

arts.ttl: Morsy's last-gasp strike prevents Southampton from claiming first win
arts.sum: Russell Martin's team were closing in on an important victory when captain Morsy struck five minutes into second-half stoppage time, sending a 20-yard volley into the top-left corner via the help of a slight deflection. There was a hint of fortune about the way in which Morsy's late strike deflected beyond Ramsdale's reach to deny Southampton their first win of 2024/25, but hard-luck stories only go so far in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Ipswich Town: Alex Jones' player ratings from Southampton draw

arts.sum: Spent plenty of time on the ball but found no space to play it forward. Southampton doubled up to nullify Liam Delap (Image: Ross Halls)

arts.ttl: Russell Martin hails ‘excellent’ Tyler Dibling after Southampton held by Ipswich
arts.sum: Sam Morsy netted stoppage-time leveller for Tractor Boys.

arts.ttl: Southampton 1-1 Ipswich Town: Kieran McKenna's verdict
arts.oTtl: East Anglican Daily Times - Ispwich Town FC
arts.sum: I know how we’ve built that over the last couple of seasons – to become a team who have regularly scored late goals in big moments in big games. “We score late in a game away from home against a team who are fighting for their first win and had great energy from the crowd and were showing resilience.

arts.ttl: Southampton and Everton both remain winless after seeing leads wiped out
arts.sum: Saints drew 1-1 with Ipswich while Everton were held to the same scoreline by Leicester

arts.ttl: Sam Morsy earns Ipswich dramatic draw at Southampton
arts.sum: Tyler Dibling had put Saints ahead with his first career goal.

arts.ttl: Southampton 1-1 Ipswich: Highlights, man of the match, stats
arts.sum: Southampton's hearts were broken on Saturday as Ipswich equalised in the dying moments, denying the Saints their first three points of the season.

arts.ttl: Southampton dealt major blow in Kyle Walker-Peters contract discussions?
arts.sum: Southampton are reportedly far away from agreeing a contract extension with Kyle Walker-Peters after discussions over renewed terms broke down.

arts.ttl: Southampton considering Championship manager as Russell Martin replacement?
arts.sum: Southampton are reportedly eyeing up Blackburn Rovers head coach John Eustace as a potential replacement for under-pressure boss Russell Martin.
